Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Great to hear that your payment is working fine! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask.
However I received a notification "Your payment authorization has failed. Please update your credit card information in Billing and proceed with resubmitting your ads."

I'm sorry to hear about the payment authorization issue. Here are the steps you can take to resolve it:
1. **Update Your Credit Card Information**: Go to the Billing section in your account and update your credit card information.
2. **Resubmit Your Ads**: After updating your payment method, make sure to resubmit your ads.
If you continue to experience issues, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance.
Please fix this so my campaign can continue to run.

I understand the urgency. Unfortunately, I can't directly fix payment issues, but you can follow these steps to resolve it quickly:
1. **Update Your Credit Card Information**: Go to the Billing section in your account and update your credit card information.
2. **Resubmit Your Ads**: After updating your payment method, make sure to resubmit your ads.
If you need further assistance or if the issue persists, please contact our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com.
